actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to congratulate the Northwestern University Wildcats on winning the 1995 Big Ten Conference football championship and on receiving an invitation to compete in the 1996 Rose Bowl, and to commend Northwestern University for its pursuit of athletic and academic excellence.

summary.text: Congratulates Northwestern University on the winning of the 1995 Big Ten Conference football championship and on the receipt by the Wildcats of an invitation to compete in the 1996 Rose Bowl. Commends the University for its pursuit of athletic as well as academic excellence.

titles.title: A resolution to congratulate the Northwestern University Wildcats on winning the 1995 Big Ten Conference football championship and on receiving an invitation to compete in the 1996 Rose Bowl, and to commend Northwestern University for its pursuit of athletic and academic excellence.
